description: Application for Non-Material Minor Amendments to planning consent ref: P2017/3103/FUL dated 12 September 2018 that granted: Demolition of the existing buildings and erection of a 27-storey building (part 10, part 15, part 20, part 25, part 27-storeys) with 3 basement levels to provide for 63,507 square metres (GIA) of office floorspace (Use Class B1(a)) and 1,222 square metres (GIA) of flexible retail/professional services/restaurant/caf√© floorspace (Use Class A1/A2/A3) along with associated access and servicing arrangements, cycle parking, refuse storage and landscaping works. The non-material minor amendments sought relate to comprise the following external design changes: 1) Repositioning of balconies; 2) Party/Boundary Wall interfaces refined; 3) Alterations to glazing; 4) Introduction of opening windows; 5) Alterations to BMU access; 6) Alterations to retail awnings and door positions; 7) Amendments to intermediate plant level louvres; 8) Alterations to North and west elevation solid / glazed articulation.
